Frequently Asked Questions

Is this a drug or medication?
No. Lom Thai is a 100% natural herbal aromatherapy product made from essential oils (menthol, camphor, eucalyptus, borneol, lemon). It's not a drug, medication, or supplement. It works through natural inhalation and topical application.
Is it TSA / airport safe?
Yes! Lom Thai is a solid/semi-solid aromatherapy stick well under liquid limits. Thousands of our customers travel with it — it's pocket-sized and flight-friendly. Many people specifically buy it for travel and motion sickness.
How long does one stick last?
Several months with daily use. The concentrated essential oils retain potency for a long time. At $0.03 per use, it's one of the most cost-effective natural remedies available.
How fast does it work?
Seconds. You'll feel the effect immediately upon inhaling. The essential oils reach your nasal passages instantly. The rollerball provides relief within 60 seconds when applied to temples.
Can my kids use it?
We recommend Lom Thai for ages 12+. The menthol concentration is designed for adults and teens. For younger children, consult your pediatrician first.
Can I use it while driving?
Absolutely — that's one of its most popular uses! Thai drivers have relied on ya dom inhalers for decades to stay alert. It fights drowsiness naturally without the crash of caffeine or energy drinks.
What's the difference between the two ends?
The top end is a nasal inhaler — breathe in the aromatic herbal blend for instant alertness and congestion relief. The bottom end has a rollerball applicator — roll the oil blend onto temples, neck, or under your nose for headache and tension relief. Two tools, one stick.
Do you offer international shipping?
Yes! We offer free shipping to the US and EU. Orders typically arrive in 5-10 business days. All orders are backed by our 30-day money-back guarantee.
